name: Ashmanov & Partners
overview:
The Company was founded and is run by top managers and programmers of Rambler Media and currently is one of the top Russian IT sector companies. The companyâ€™s business scope includes:

  • Search optimization, statistics solutions, marketing audit of Web-sites, Internet consulting
  • Organizing seminars and conferences on Internet marketing
  • Software and services in the field of context advertizing
  • Development and support of internet projects, technical optimization and information systems audits.

Currently, Ashmanov&Partners is the leader in the field of Russian Internet marketing. The company engages in website promotion, context advertizing management and performs complex projects concerning overall e-business development. Ashanov&Partners hosts two annual conferences, which are considered the main events in the industry.
